JobTitle: Sr. Talent Manager, Strategic Talent Planning
JobFullDesc: Microsoft is on a mission to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. Our culture is centered on embracing a growth mindset, a theme of inspiring excellence, and encouraging teams and leaders to bring their best each day. In doing so, we create life-changing innovations that impact billions of lives around the world. You can help us achieve our mission. Microsoft Global Talent Mangement is currently modernizing its strategy to enable best-in-class talent management, career and skills development, better market alignment, strategic business planning, and deeper talent insight. The Strategic Talent Planning (STP) team is focused on delivering high impact consulting, consulting tools and frameworks, critical analytical insights while contributing to the strategic focus areas for Microsofts talent ecosystem.   This role will drive and deliver high impact work within Strategic Talent Planning, including consulting engagements, analytics and insights, and program management across practice areas. In addition, the role partners across HR and the business in the effective communication, implementation and consumption Global Talent Management strategic pillars.  The Snr Talent Manager will act as a subject matter expert in the areas related to Strategic Talent Planning, contributing both directly to consulting engagements as wall as architecture and design of platform solutions.  ResponsibilitiesConsulting Engagements (STP) Acts as a subject matter expert to consult internal clients on talent strategy solutions and best practices; proposes data-based recommendations to HR and business leaders, leveraging knowledge of best practices. Project owner for high complexity and scale talent consulting projects and client engagement with HR Partners in Microsofts Talent and HR Client functions. Communicates talent planning approaches to leaders and stakeholders (HR and business), often at the executive level, utilizing data to educate and influence buy-in and implementation of solutions. Leverages the BMW (business, market, workforce) methodology within STP to understand the business, workforce and external talent market, generate insightful analytics based on that methodology, and then develop talent solutions that address critical talent requirements Works with partner HR client teams to develop strategic talent plans  Builds a case for proposed plans, supports the HR client team in gaining ownership/agreement for the course of action Develops monitoring and analysis techniques to measure the clarity and alignment of strategy, and provides insight to the client team.
